languages.text: "Это наследие прошлого Мастера дисциплины, который вместе с господином сенешалем покинул Флот, чтобы служить Леди Теодоре. Он привел с собой немало офицеров и установил традицию: после гибели или отставки сослуживца передавать его доспех отличившемуся блюстителю. В свое время я была награждена такой броней, а после смерти предшественника унаследовала его личный доспех".

traits.locale_text: "Это наследие прошлого Мастера дисциплины, который вместе с господином сенешалем покинул Флот, чтобы служить Леди Теодоре. Он привел с собой немало офицеров и установил традицию: после гибели или отставки сослуживца передавать его доспех отличившемуся блюстителю. В свое время я была награждена такой броней, а после смерти предшественника унаследовала его личный доспех".

languages.text: "I inherited it from the previous Master-at-Arms. Like the esteemed Seneschal, he left the Navy to serve Lady Theodora. He brought quite a few officers with him and established a tradition: upon the death or resignation of an enforcer, his or her armour would be passed on to a fellow officer who had distinguished themselves in the course of their duties. I was awarded armour in this way in my time, and upon the death of my predecessor, I inherited his personal armour."
languages.original_text: "Это наследие прошлого Мастера дисциплины, который вместе с господином сенешалем покинул Флот, чтобы служить Леди Теодоре. В свое время я была награждена такой броней, а после смерти предшественника унаследовала его личный доспех".

I was awarded armour in this way in my time, and upon the death of my predecessor, I inherited his personal armour."

He brought quite a few officers with him and established a tradition: upon the death or resignation of an enforcer, his or her armour would be passed on to a fellow officer who had distinguished themselves in the course of their duties. I was awarded armour in this way in my time, and upon the death of my predecessor, I inherited his personal armour."

languages.text: “是从前任戒律大师那里继承而来的。前任戒律大师与受人尊敬的总领一样，离开了帝国海军的队伍，前来侍奉西奥多拉夫人。许多军官都随着他一起上了这艘船，他们还创立了这样的传统：每当一名执法者死亡或辞职时，那名执法者的护甲就会传给执行任务期间表现出色的同事。我还是个执法者的时候，就是这样得到了属于我的盔甲，而当我的前任戒律大师去世之后，我继承了他的私人盔甲。”
languages.original_text: "I inherited it from the previous Master-at-Arms. Like the esteemed Seneschal, he left the Navy to serve Lady Theodora. He brought quite a few officers with him and established a tradition: upon the death or resignation of an enforcer, his or her armour would be passed on to a fellow officer who had distinguished themselves in the course of their duties. I was awarded armour in this way in my time, and upon the death of my predecessor, I inherited his personal armour."

traits.locale_text: “是从前任戒律大师那里继承而来的。前任戒律大师与受人尊敬的总领一样，离开了帝国海军的队伍，前来侍奉西奥多拉夫人。许多军官都随着他一起上了这艘船，他们还创立了这样的传统：每当一名执法者死亡或辞职时，那名执法者的护甲就会传给执行任务期间表现出色的同事。我还是个执法者的时候，就是这样得到了属于我的盔甲，而当我的前任戒律大师去世之后，我继承了他的私人盔甲。”

languages.text: «La heredé del anterior maestro de armas. Al igual que el estimado senescal, él también dejó la Armada para servir a lady Theodora. Se trajo consigo a no pocos oficiales que establecieron una tradición: en caso de fallecimiento o dimisión, la armadura de un guardia se cedería a un oficial que se hubiese distinguido en el desempeño de su cargo. Así fue como yo obtuve mi primera armadura en su momento, y cuando mi predecesor murió, heredé su armadura personal».
languages.original_text: "I inherited it from the previous Master-at-Arms. Like the esteemed Seneschal, he left the Navy to serve Lady Theodora. He brought quite a few officers with him and established a tradition: upon the death or resignation of an enforcer, his or her armour would be passed on to a fellow officer who had distinguished themselves in the course of their duties. I was awarded armour in this way in my time, and upon the death of my predecessor, I inherited his personal armour."

traits.locale_text: «La heredé del anterior maestro de armas. Al igual que el estimado senescal, él también dejó la Armada para servir a lady Theodora. Se trajo consigo a no pocos oficiales que establecieron una tradición: en caso de fallecimiento o dimisión, la armadura de un guardia se cedería a un oficial que se hubiese distinguido en el desempeño de su cargo. Así fue como yo obtuve mi primera armadura en su momento, y cuando mi predecesor murió, heredé su armadura personal».

languages.text: 「前任のマスター・アット・アームから受け継いだものです。尊敬する家令長と同じく、彼はシオドーラ様に仕えるために海軍を去ったのです。彼はかなりの数の士官を連れてきて、エンフォーサーの死去や辞任の際には、職務上功績のあった同僚にその鎧を譲るという伝統を築いたんです。私の世代もこうして鎧を授与され、前任者の死後は彼の鎧を受け継ぎました」
languages.original_text: "I inherited it from the previous Master-at-Arms. Like the esteemed Seneschal, he left the Navy to serve Lady Theodora. He brought quite a few officers with him and established a tradition: upon the death or resignation of an enforcer, his or her armour would be passed on to a fellow officer who had distinguished themselves in the course of their duties. I was awarded armour in this way in my time, and upon the death of my predecessor, I inherited his personal armour."

traits.locale_text: 「前任のマスター・アット・アームから受け継いだものです。尊敬する家令長と同じく、彼はシオドーラ様に仕えるために海軍を去ったのです。彼はかなりの数の士官を連れてきて、エンフォーサーの死去や辞任の際には、職務上功績のあった同僚にその鎧を譲るという伝統を築いたんです。私の世代もこうして鎧を授与され、前任者の死後は彼の鎧を受け継ぎました」

languages.text: "Ich habe sie vom früheren Waffenmeister übernommen. Er hatte die Flotte wie der geschätzte Truchsess verlassen, um Lady Theodora zu dienen. Er brachte einige wenige Offiziere mit und begründete eine Tradition: Nach dem Tod oder der Entlassung eines Enforcers geht seine oder ihre Rüstung auf einen Offizier über, der sich bei der Ausübung seiner Pflicht bewährt hat. Ich habe seinerzeit auf diese Weise meine Rüstung unterhalten und übernahm nach dem Tod meines Vorgängers seine persönliche Rüstung."
languages.original_text: "I inherited it from the previous Master-at-Arms. Like the esteemed Seneschal, he left the Navy to serve Lady Theodora. He brought quite a few officers with him and established a tradition: upon the death or resignation of an enforcer, his or her armour would be passed on to a fellow officer who had distinguished themselves in the course of their duties. I was awarded armour in this way in my time, and upon the death of my predecessor, I inherited his personal armour."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe sie vom früheren Waffenmeister übernommen. Er hatte die Flotte wie der geschätzte Truchsess verlassen, um Lady Theodora zu dienen. Er brachte einige wenige Offiziere mit und begründete eine Tradition: Nach dem Tod oder der Entlassung eines Enforcers geht seine oder ihre Rüstung auf einen Offizier über, der sich bei der Ausübung seiner Pflicht bewährt hat. Ich habe seinerzeit auf diese Weise meine Rüstung unterhalten und übernahm nach dem Tod meines Vorgängers seine persönliche Rüstung."

languages.text: « J'en ai hérité du précédent capitaine d'armes. À l'instar du vénérable sénéchal, il a quitté la Marine pour servir dame Théodora. Il a amené avec lui une poignée d'officiers et instauré une tradition : à la mort ou à la démission d'un prévôt, son armure reviendrait à l'un de ses collègues qui s'étaient illustrés dans le cadre de leurs fonctions. C'est ainsi que j'ai reçu ma première armure, et par la suite, lorsque mon prédécesseur nous a quittés, on m'a remis sa cuirasse personnelle. »
languages.original_text: "I inherited it from the previous Master-at-Arms. Like the esteemed Seneschal, he left the Navy to serve Lady Theodora. He brought quite a few officers with him and established a tradition: upon the death or resignation of an enforcer, his or her armour would be passed on to a fellow officer who had distinguished themselves in the course of their duties. I was awarded armour in this way in my time, and upon the death of my predecessor, I inherited his personal armour."

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai hérité du précédent capitaine d'armes. À l'instar du vénérable sénéchal, il a quitté la Marine pour servir dame Théodora. Il a amené avec lui une poignée d'officiers et instauré une tradition : à la mort ou à la démission d'un prévôt, son armure reviendrait à l'un de ses collègues qui s'étaient illustrés dans le cadre de leurs fonctions. C'est ainsi que j'ai reçu ma première armure, et par la suite, lorsque mon prédécesseur nous a quittés, on m'a remis sa cuirasse personnelle. »

languages.text: "Önceki Silahtar'dan miras aldım. Tıpkı değerli Seneşal gibi o da Leydi Theodora'ya hizmet etmek için Donanma'dan ayrılmıştı. Yanında çok sayıda subay getirmiş ve bir gelenek başlatmıştı: Bir infazcının ölümü veya görevden ayrılması sonrasında zırhı, hizmetleriyle ön plana çıkan diğer bir subaya geçer. Görev yaparken bana bu şekilde bir zırh armağan edilmişti ve selefimin ölümünün ardından onun şahsi zırhını miras aldım."
languages.original_text: "I inherited it from the previous Master-at-Arms. Like the esteemed Seneschal, he left the Navy to serve Lady Theodora. He brought quite a few officers with him and established a tradition: upon the death or resignation of an enforcer, his or her armour would be passed on to a fellow officer who had distinguished themselves in the course of their duties. I was awarded armour in this way in my time, and upon the death of my predecessor, I inherited his personal armour."
